dataCollection.title: 3. Data Collection on this Website
dataCollection.content:
Our website uses the so-called Local Storage to store certain settings, such as the theme (design) and the language of your user interface. This data helps us remember your preferences and provide you with a personalized experience.

3.1. What is Local Storage?
Local Storage is a feature of modern web browsers that allows data to be stored locally on your device. Unlike cookies, Local Storage can store larger amounts of data, and the data remains available even after the browser is closed until it is explicitly deleted.

3.2. Use of Local Storage on our Website
We use Local Storage exclusively for the following purposes:
  • Storing your chosen theme: So that the design you prefer (e.g., light or dark mode) is automatically applied on your next visit.
  • Storing your preferred language: So that the user interface is displayed in your chosen language.

3.3. Use of Google Analytics
We also use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google Inc. (“Google”), to collect anonymized information about the use of our website. For example, page views along with the date are recorded and aggregated (e.g., on 02/02/2025, the page was viewed by 5 users). The collected data is used solely for analysis and optimization of our website and is not combined with data from other sources.

3.4. Granular Data Collection (Google Signals)
In addition to the standard data collection, Google Analytics offers the option, via Google Signals, to collect more detailed information. This includes, for example:
  • Precise location information (e.g., city and region – without the full address)
  • Device details, such as brand, model, and operating system version
  • Browser information, such as the version (without the full user agent string)
  • Screen resolution
This additional data enables enhanced features, such as targeted remarketing and more detailed analysis. If you do not wish to have this detailed data collection, you can disable this option in your privacy settings. The additional data is used solely for analytical purposes.

noPersonalData.title: 4. No Collection of Personal Data
noPersonalData.content: We would like to expressly point out that we do not collect, store, or process any personal data about you. The information stored in Local Storage is used solely to improve your experience on our website and does not contain any information that could be used to identify you.

deleteData.title: 5. How to Delete Your Data
deleteData.content:
Since the information stored in Local Storage does not contain any personal data, you can delete it at any time without any issues. Here’s how you can clear Local Storage in the most common browsers:

Google Chrome:
  1. Click the three-dot menu in the top right and select 'Settings'.
  2. Scroll down and click 'Advanced'.
  3. Under 'Privacy and security', choose 'Clear browsing data'.
  4. Select the time range and ensure that 'Cookies and other site data' as well as 'Cached images and files' are selected.
  5. Click 'Clear data'.

Mozilla Firefox:
  1. Click the hamburger menu in the top right and select 'Options'.
  2. Go to 'Privacy & Security'.
  3. Under 'Cookies and Site Data', click 'Manage Data'.
  4. Select the relevant data and click 'Remove'.

Microsoft Edge:
  1. Click the three-dot menu in the top right and select 'Settings'.
  2. Go to 'Privacy, search, and services'.
  3. Under 'Clear browsing data', click 'Choose what to clear'.
  4. Select the desired data and click 'Clear now'.

Safari (Mac):
  1. Go to 'Safari' > 'Preferences'.
  2. Select the 'Privacy' tab.
  3. Click 'Manage Website Data'.
  4. Select the data you wish to remove and click 'Remove'.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content:
Although we do not collect personal data, we would like to inform you that you have the following rights:
  • Right to Information: You can request information about the data we store at any time.
  • Right to Deletion: You can request the deletion of the data stored in Local Storage.
  • Right to Correction: If the stored data is incorrect, you have the right to request its correction.

changes.title: 7. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time with future effect. The current version is always available on our website. Please review the Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed of any changes.
